name: Buns-pasta-truck
body:
Game Objective

Pick the right ingredients for a recipe to cook the dish that a customer ordered

Basic Game Play (MVP)
  • Player is shown one recipe
  • Player starts with 3 lives and a time limit of 40s
  • An order is shown on screen
  • Pick the right ingredients to prepare the order
  • Each correct order earns 5 points
  • Each wrong order costs 1 life
  • New order is shown after an order is completed
  • Complete as many orders within the time limit of 40s
  • Game ends immediately when life = 0

    • Additional Feature #1: Allow Delete
  • Add button to remove ingredient from stove

    • Additional Feature #2: Level Up
  • Level up when player survives 40s and lives != 0
  • Add more recipes at each level (max 3 levels)

    • Additional Feature #3: Orders Per Round
  • Level up when player completes at least 3 orders within 40s and lives != 0
